titles.title: A bill to require the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to establish a FEMA region for the Pacific, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12739-12740)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/29/1993--Introduced. Requires the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) to establish a FEMA region for Hawaii and specified U.S. possessions in the Pacific.
